name: One Tome Wizard
description:
By Daquan G.

Help the Wizard Defeat the monsters as he cast spells of the same colors to beat them, however this wizard can only cast one kind of spell at a time. You must use the  space bar  to switch spells or mash your way out sticky situations, but be careful because every few monsters killed can either speed up or slow down time. Choose when to switch wisely.
developers: NYU Game Center - High School Programs
